1.content:
Fry- average human height, slightly chubby, 34 inch waist, orange hair. Wears blue jeans, White t-shirt and red jacket.
Hermes- average human height, fat, 38 inch waist.
Zap brannigan- slightly taller than average, blonde hair, fairly slim, 32 inch waist.
1.title: Choose a character to fatten up

choices: The crew had bought a ton of food.
111.content: Fry woke up in the morning earlier than everyone, which was unusual, especially for Fry. But Fry had a mission of his own. To get fatter. He had always had a potbelly, but it didn't feel like enough to play with in bed anymore. Fry goes to the kitchen and looks in the fridge.
111.title: By himself, now let's get the party started!

112.content: The planet culinaria had recently been evacuated due to the glordonians threatening to blow up the planet. Fry had been asked to eat as much as he could of the food left on the planet to prevent it turning into mould and developing brains. Zap had, as usual, enlisted himself to help on this mission, as he thought fry could not do it alone. Before they departed on this mission, the professor insisted that they buy large clothes so as not to outgrow their own clothes.
112.title: Zap

choices: They put on the wider clothes!
They put on their clothes and started to eat!
1121.content: Fry has agreed to buy bigger clothes as long as Zapp does the same. Zapp agreed, together they bought the store "Jumbo Man". As soon as they arrived on the planet Fry and Zapp were amazed, the planet really was made of food, they then ...
1121.title: They did

info.description:
Rules:
Male weight gain ONLY
No vore
All male characters wear belts
Characters must measure waist size as well as weight
No instant weight gain
